page.title: 12T.V. AND VIDEOS IN CHINGFORD
page.content:
Most of us have videos nowadays.We found that our favourite programmes were "The Young Ones","Spitting Image" "Kenny Everett","Cover Up","Allo,Allo" and"Dallas".Our favourite videos were "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" "Beat St"and both"Breakdance 1&2". {HOBBIES In our class survey about hobbies and interests(10&11year olds)drawing came top.Ballet came bottom,one person went to this.Only a few people went to Youth Clubs.Quite alot of people coll- ected stinky stickers.Other hobbies were ice-skating,hockey,running,golf and snooker.Key-rings,rubbers and tropical shells were also collected by some people.
**********
